marytts.tools.newlanguage.it
Class LTSLexiconPOSCreator

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.newlanguage.it.LTSLexiconPOSCreator

public class LTSLexiconPOSCreator
extends java.lang.Object

LTSLexiconPOSCreator has the same functionalities of TRANSCRIPTION TOOL but without GUI (better for a remote use for large lexicon and for scripting). This class is a light version of TranscriptionTable Train Letter-to-sound(LTS) rules, create FST dictionary and POS tagger

Author:
Fabio Tesser Example use: java -Xmx4096m -classpath $MARY_BASE/java:$MARY_BASE/java/mary-common.jar:$MARY_BASE/java/log4j-1.2.15.jar:$MARY_BASE/java/weka.jar marytts.tools.newlanguage.it.LTSLexiconPOSCreator lib/modules/it/lexicon/allophones.it.xml lib/modules/it/lexicon/it.txt
